meanings.definition: People who hear or pay attention to something.
meanings.sent1: The listeners in the classroom were quiet and focused on the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The radio show had many listeners who tuned in every day.
meanings.sent3: The listeners at the comedy show burst into laughter at the comedian's jokes.
meanings.sent4: The listeners to the music felt like they were transported to another world.
meanings.sent5: The listeners at the concert clapped and cheered for the talented musicians.

meanings.definition: Devices or equipment used to receive sound.
meanings.sent1: The headphones are great listeners, delivering clear sound to the ears.
meanings.sent2: The new speakers are perfect for music lovers who want quality listeners.
meanings.sent3: The old radio was a loyal listener, playing music for hours on end.
meanings.sent4: The microphone acted as a keen listener, capturing every word spoken.
meanings.sent5: The amplifier served as a powerful listener, enhancing the sound for the audience.
